import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useAppContext } from '../../contexts/AppContext'; import Card from '../common/Card'; import Button from '../common/Button'; import Modal from '../common/Modal'; const ProfileScreen = () => { const { user, updateUser } = useAppContext(); const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); const [editForm, setEditForm] = useState({ name: user?.name || '', role: user?.role || '', bio: user?.bio || '', location: user?.location || '', genres: user?.genres || [] }); const handleSave = () => { updateUser(editForm); setIsEditing(false); }; return (

{user?.name}

{user?.role}

{user?.location}

About

{user?.bio || 'Add a bio to tell others about yourself'}

Genres

{user?.genres?.map(genre => ( {genre} ))}
127 Connections
45 Bookings
4.8 Rating
setIsEditing(false)} title="Edit Profile" >
setEditForm({...editForm, name: e.target.value})} />
